message_1: Find the discrete logarithm of 3 base 7 modulo 17.
message_2:
To find the discrete logarithm of 3 base 7 modulo 17, we are looking for an integer x such that:

7^x ≡ 3 (mod 17)

We can start by calculating the powers of 7 modulo 17 until we find the desired result:

7^1 ≡ 7 (mod 17)
7^2 ≡ 15 (mod 17)
7^3 ≡ 6 (mod 17)
7^4 ≡ 9 (mod 17)
7^5 ≡ 13 (mod 17)
7^6 ≡ 12 (mod 17)
7^7 ≡ 1 (mod 17)
7^8 ≡ 7 (mod 17)

We can see that 7^3 ≡ 6 (mod 17) and 7^4 ≡ 9 (mod 17). We can multiply these two results to get:

(7^3 * 7^4) ≡ (6 * 9) (mod 17)
7^(3+4) ≡ 54 (mod 17)
7^7 ≡ 3 (mod 17)

So, the discrete logarithm of 3 base 7 modulo 17 is x = 7.
